message: You arrive at the capital's imposing gates. Guards thoroughly inspect all who enter.

options.message: Tell the guards about the unjust attack on your village.
Present yourself as a merchant seeking trade opportunities.

message: The guards exchange knowing looks before declaring you 'a person of interest' and arresting you.

options.message: You're escorted to the prison, already planning your next move.

message: Your merchant story convinces the guards. They wave you through the gates.

options.message: You make your way into the bustling capital.
